channel.title: ~[317] VestigePK v1.0 Development - Server + Client [317]~
channel.description:
VestigePK v1.0 is currently in development, and I just whipped it up via delta source. I'm currently in the process, and in need of, custom items like dclaws, vesta, statius, and etc... If anyone wants to start working on it, I'd be glad to have the help. Its currently the same as delta (whipped up in about 8 hrs) but has different home/features/shops/and some more. Its aimed to be a pk server, and there are wonderful commands for any user, such as ::master, ::pure, ::rich, etc...
I have downloads for the client and the server, both of which are delta-based. Hopefully we can get this made into an awesome 317 for Mopar. ( If you contribute your knowledge, you will be acknowledged in the credits :) )
DOWNLOAD CLIENT: http://uppit.com/v/PQDPFC6J
DOWNLOAD SERVER: http://uppit.com/v/MIULRJIS
POST IF YOU WANT PICTURES, BECAUSE THIS IS MY FIRST DEVELOPMENT POST LOL :D

item.title: ~[317] VestigePK v1.0 Development - Server + Client [317]~
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

[quote=“fatwallet, post:4, topic:288242”]Really? I thought that “Server Development” meant you put up your server and/or client for help with “development” by other members…Well, then I thought wrong, but they should fix it then and say: “NO SERVERS IN DEVELOPMENT TO BE POSTED IN THE SERVER DEVELOPMENT FORUM”…honestly, they gotta change that then, because its misleading :S

This is not sarcasim, its honesty btw[/quote]
Ok well sorry about freaking out lol I was mad at the time but yes, please if you provide a download, put it in the downloads section.

Read full topic
